metadata.title: CVE-2015-5651 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Dotclear before 2.8.1 allowsremote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecifiedvectors.

criterions.comment: dotclear: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
